KEYWORD.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.

PEEL.DESCRIPTION: Lose #yPlated #yArmor to activate effect. You cannot peel if you do not have enough #yPlated #yArmor.

CONSTRICTED.DESCRIPTION: Constricted enemies take damage equal to their #yConstricted at the end of their turn.

RECLAIM.DESCRIPTION: Adds a copy of a random card from your discard pile into your hand.

SUCK.DESCRIPTION: Heal X HP and reduce this healing by 1 this combat.

REACT.DESCRIPTION: Activate effect if the enemy intends to do a certain action.
